content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice puzzle easy to understand but tricky to implement, will be hard in golf code took me moment to find a solution i was happy with here it is:

n,s=map(int,open(0))
[print(*(s+j*n+(n-1-i if j&1 else i)for j in range(n)))for i in range(n)]

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice visual puzzle that leverages on a few foundational concepts such as loops and lists. Might be tricky for beginners but overall very instructive

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice.
Solved in Python.

Goal
* Please add "from left to right" after "column by column".

* Please explain what numbers should be filled in the matrix.

Constraints
* Please change -10⁶ and 10⁶ to -100 to 100 respectively, reflecting what's actually covered in the cases.

Cases
* Each test should be similar to (but not the same as) its corresponding validator. Please revise the validators accordingly.

* Test 3 / Validator 3: Please change [[s]] to another negative integer.

Thanks.
Thanks for reviewing my contribution, I have updated my contribution. hope its all good
